select a.menu_id id, a.menu_title title, a.menu_url href, case when b.role_menu_id is not null then '1' else '0' end checked, #{disabled} disabled, '0' spread from sys_menu a left join sys_role_menu b on a.menu_id = b.menu_id and b.role_id = #{roleId} where a.is_enable = '1' and a.menu_type = '1'
and a.parent_id is null
and a.parent_id = #{parentId}
order by a.menu_order
